title: PMS 2.0 550 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Patrick Surtain II, Ian Rapoport, Shams Charania, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ, and the boys chat about tonight's Thursday Night Football game between the Cowboys and the Saints in New Orleans and announce the new Super Boost that the Covid Cowboy has concocted available only on FanDuel. Joining the show to chat about tonight's game and to do his weekly Rapsheet Wrap-Up as we get ready for week 13 of the NFL season, is NFL Network Insider, Ian Rapoport (34:57-58:56). Next, #9 pick of the 2021 NFL Draft, reigning AFC Defensive Player of the Week, Denver Broncos CB, Patrick Surtain II joins the show. Pat, Patrick, and AJ chat about his quick success in the NFL, what it was like playing for Nick Saban at Alabama, if he was always prepared because of his dad's success in the league, how much more important film study is in the NFL, and more (58:58-1:10:13). Later, NBA Insider for The Athletic and Stadium and friend of the program, Shams Charania joins the show to get us caught up to date on what is going on in the NBA and what we can look forward to in the next few weeks (1:12:19-1:37:58). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
